package org.javaro.lecture; public class Ex7_11 { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Studentx stud1 = new Studentx(); stud1.setStudNo("20181388"); stud1.setName("윤지한"); System.out.println(stud1.getStudNo()); System.out.println(stud1.getName()); } } class Studentx { String studNo, name; public void setStudNo(String studNo) { this.studNo = studNo; } public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; } public String getStudNo() { return this.studNo; } public String getName() { return this.name; } }
